nodes.label: User Authentication System
nodes.description: Implement secure user authentication with OAuth 2.0 and JWT token-based session management

nodes.label: Data Storage and Persistence Layer
nodes.description: Implement scalable data storage with PostgreSQL for relational data and Redis for caching

nodes.label: REST API and GraphQL Gateway
nodes.description: Implement unified API gateway supporting both REST and GraphQL protocols with rate limiting and authentication

nodes.label: Graph Database Integration for Knowledge Management
nodes.description: Integrate Neo4j graph database for storing and querying knowledge graph with atoms, modules, and relationships

nodes.label: AI-Powered Impact Analysis and Code Review
nodes.description: Integrate Claude AI for automated impact analysis, PR summarization, and reviewer recommendation

nodes.label: Authentication System Architecture
nodes.description: System design for OAuth 2.0 and JWT-based authentication with token rotation and MFA support

nodes.label: Data Layer Architecture with PostgreSQL and Redis
nodes.description: Detailed design for data persistence, caching strategy, and connection pooling

nodes.label: Unified API Gateway with REST and GraphQL
nodes.description: API gateway design supporting both REST and GraphQL protocols with shared authentication and rate limiting

nodes.label: Neo4j Graph Database Integration Architecture
nodes.description: Design for bidirectional sync between YAML files and Neo4j graph database with Cypher query patterns

nodes.label: AI-Powered Impact Analysis with Claude
nodes.description: Design for Claude API integration following claude.md guidelines for PR analysis and impact scoring

nodes.label: Authentication Service Deployment
nodes.description: Standard operating procedure for deploying authentication service updates to production

nodes.label: Database Backup and Recovery
nodes.description: Procedures for PostgreSQL and Redis backup, verification, and disaster recovery

nodes.label: API Gateway Deployment and Rolling Update
nodes.description: Procedure for deploying API gateway changes with zero downtime using blue-green deployment

nodes.label: Neo4j Synchronization and Maintenance
nodes.description: Procedure for synchronizing YAML atoms to Neo4j and performing routine database maintenance

nodes.label: Claude AI Impact Analysis Workflow
nodes.description: Procedure for running Claude-powered impact analysis on pull requests following claude.md guidelines

nodes.label: Authentication System Test Plan
nodes.description: Comprehensive test suite for authentication service including unit, integration, and security tests

nodes.label: Database Backup and Recovery Validation
nodes.description: Test procedures to validate backup integrity and recovery processes

nodes.label: API Gateway Testing and Load Validation
nodes.description: Test plan for REST and GraphQL APIs including functional, performance, and security testing

nodes.label: Access Control and RBAC Policy
nodes.description: Role-based access control policy defining user roles, permissions, and authentication requirements

nodes.label: AI/ML Usage and Data Privacy Policy
nodes.description: Policy governing use of AI services (Claude API) including data privacy, PII handling, and compliance requirements

nodes.label: Authentication System Security Vulnerabilities
nodes.description: Security risks related to authentication implementation including brute force, token theft, and OAuth vulnerabilities

nodes.label: Data Loss and Corruption Risks
nodes.description: Risks related to database failures, backup corruption, and data integrity issues

nodes.label: AI Service Dependency and Privacy Risks
nodes.description: Risks related to Claude API availability, costs, and potential data exposure
